column2: [IDEA-201343] Add standard Maven properties to pom.xml of just created Maven based module

column3: This should resolve the IDEA-201343 improvement ticket submitted by me.
The third commit (75dfbe6) needs maven-compiler-plugin 3.6 or newer. It should be merged after IDEA-183383 is fixed, since the currently bundled Maven 3.3.9 uses an older maven-compiler-plugin.

You can check the maven-compiler-plugin versions according to the Maven releases by links as following:
http://maven.apache.org/ref/3.3.9/plugin-management.html
http://maven.apache.org/ref/3.6.0/plugin-management.html
The first (33ec14a) and the second (6ec8e43) commits could be merged already now, before IDEA-183383 is fixed.
